reviews.review:
Este jogo é HILÁRIO. Portal 2, em conjunto com o 1, se tornou facilmente o 2º melhor jogo que já joguei em toda minha vida (perdendo apenas para Castlevania: Symphony Of The Night).

Não vou negar, é um jogo fácil. Dificilmente alguém não conseguirá finalizá-lo, mas é extremamente divertido e engraçado. Mesmo sendo fácil, existe uma certa satisfação ao resolver um "quebra-cabeça" utilizando não somente portais, mas também outras coisas.

Recomendadíssimo esse jogo. A única coisa que não gostei e do fato de não haver uma mísera informação sobre um provável Portal 3 :( AHAHAH
Just get it. I dont care what it cost, it will be worh it.

For those that don't already know, this is the follow up to the incredibly simple yet simply amazing game called Portal. If you don't play the first Portal before you play this game you're cheating yourself out of a truly excellent experience. 

Imagine a 3d puzzle platformer in first person that actually works...

Extremely simple game mechanics; you have gravity and two portals, go in one portal come out the other.

What could be simpler?
i dont even need to say anything
Portal 2 is a basic yet challenging puzzeler that really makes you think from time to time. The single player has a comical and interesting story, and the co-op is good fun as well!
if you don't buy this game on sale you're very stupid as it is the best game to ever be made
this game good game man

I lost my wife kids job and house, Portal 2 is the only thing i have left. Right now i am currently living in the attic of th house that i used to own, meanwhile a new family is moving in and mine is long gone. I've spent countless hours playing and replaying the portal 2 story while i sit with my portal 2 merchandise together. This game ruined my life and it was worth it.
Hatte es bereits auf der PS3 und jetzt beim Sale habe ich es mir nochmal für meinen PC geholt, mit Sicherheit eines der besten Spiele der letzten 10 Jahre!

Even then, the main character would have to be different.  Anyway, it's a good game.

説明不要の名作パズルゲームの続編
前作のラストからの続きで、舞台、設定、登場人物もほぼ引継ぎです（新キャラ有り）
前作と比べストーリー寄りでパズルがやや単調（簡単？)で、ストーリー性はアップと感じた。
とは言ってもパズルが劣化したわけでは無くゲーム、シナリオ共に高いレベルを保っている。
風景とストーリーを堪能しつつパズルも楽しめる贅沢ゲーム。お勧め!
ガラクタ→全知全能AI→じゃがいも→と忙しく変化するGLaDOSちゃんのツンデレっぷりがかわいい。
前作をやっていないと話がわからないので１・２セット購入を推奨。
せっかくスチームに登録したのだからやって前作とともに、やっておかないともったいないゲーム。

Portal 2 est de ces jeux mythiques que tout geek se doit d'avoir dans sa bilbiothèque steam, c'est un "must have" que vous jouerez et rejouerez en boucle avec plaisir avant d'explorer toutes les maps du workshop avec vos amis ! La première fois que vous y jouerez, ce sera avec la passion de la découverte. Les fois suivante, ce sera avec la nostalgie de votre première partie ! Autant dire que pour le prix actuel, c'est une offre à ne pas manquer !

Pour vous donner une idée de mes prétentions, j'ai acheté le Two pack pour y jouer avec un ami... Qui à fait de même ... On à donc deux portal 2 en trop ! C'est très bête je sais... Mais si quiconque parmi vous est intéressé pour m'échanger ce jeu contre un autre, ce sera possible à compter de 30 jours après la date ou j'ai posté cette évaluation, n'hésitez pas à m'ajouter ou à me MP, ou simplement à répondre à cette évaluation pour me faire part de vos offres!

Merci d'avance pour votre considération et à la prochaine amis gameurs !
Ist nicht scheiße.

I enjoy portal 2. It's a good graphic, well-narrated, good minded game. I love Gladus or however you say it. The puzzles are fun and innovative, and I love playing co-op. It's a great addition to portal. I recomend this game if you love abandoned stuff. machines gone wrong, and of course, portals.

De todos los juegos que he jugado en la vida, este ha sido el mejor por excelencia.
Historia: 10/10
Personajes: 10/10
Diálogos: 10/10
Gráficas: 8/10 (Son bastante buenas, pero no de última generación)
Físicas de movimiento: 9/10 (Hay algunos bugs pequeños al poner portales en caída vertical)
Jugabilidad: 9/10 (Poner portales a veces cuesta y demora varios minutos)

Lo único malo es que la historia tiene fin (y probablemente habrá que esperar mucho para una tercera entrega), habrá que conformarse con los mapas de la comunidad de la "Perpetual Testing Initiative".
Lo bueno; Todo. Sin duda un juego que recordarás por mucho tiempo.

Самая лучшая игра в жанре: "Головоломка от первого лица"! Прошёл, как первую, так и вторую часть! И... Я в восторге от замечательного сюжета данной тематики! Создатели игры, просто перевернули моё сознание! С нетерпением и надеждой, жду третью часть этой замечательной, во всех смыслах, игры!   Кто ещё пока думает, покупать или нет, отвечу: ПОКУПАЙТЕ НЕ ЗАДУМЫВАЯСЬ!

Id normally put in a lot of effort to describe what I like about a game when I review it positively but Ill pass on that this time; theres nothing positive I can say which hasn't already been said about a game with a 99% approval rate on Steam and a 95/100 on Metacritic, those numbers pretty much speak for themselves: this game is (Diamond-plated) Gold.

Theres really nothing Negative I can think about the game either; only mildly annoying point I personally had would be a lot of questions regarding our much admired silent protagonist being left more or less up to the gamers to decide, while only being mysteriously hinted at in ways nearing the end. Lots of theories; few solid answers (QQ). I doubt most people would really mind that though; even for me it wasn't enough to detract me from liking the game.

Tl;DR: 9.99/10
 Cant say theres any reason not to play this game; Portal 2 really has an Apeal which can give more or less any gamer an awesome experience, probably even if your not a big fan of Puzzle games! Not to mention it goes on sale pretty darn often; worth every dollar spent even at full price though. Just make sure you play the original first, not only because its a legendary awesome game but the story follows over and all so....

Amazing. Challenging, funny, mind-cracking, and with replayable experience thanks to the co-op campaign plus the creation of personal puzzles or playing from those made from the community. If you liked the first Portal and/or like FPS games with puzzle and/or like co-op games that need thinking, this is a must have.
